author: Vimal Patel
title: 5 West Point Cadets Overdose During Spring Break in Florida, Officials Say
description: The cadets, along with another young man, were exposed to what is believed to be cocaine laced with fentanyl, and two were on ventilators late Friday, officials said.
content:
Data for previous years was not immediately available.
